name: Orca Platformer
description:
Help an Orca get enough coins to travel to the Orca Day Festival!

Orca Platformer is a simple 2D platformer where you guide an Orca through seventeen levels while collecting coins and avoiding enemies.

I made this as a challenge to myself - to code a "feature complete" game. It's not much but it is all there.

Controls:
Move: A/D or Arrow keys
Jump: Spacebar or Up arrow
Hint: Try pressing jump more.

Assets by:
Tileset and Backgrounds: Eder Muniz
Sound Effects: David Stearns
Menu and Ending Music: Abstraction (www.abstractionmusic.com)
Font, Additional Assets, and Sounds: Kenney Game Assets
Engine: Godot 3.3
